attributes.action: Make schools in the UK more eco - friendly.
attributes.additional_details: We think that the government should help schools on the right path to be more eco-friendly. We believe the government focus more on making the schools in the UK more green and reduce their carbon footprint it would definitely make an impact on reducing pollution in the UK.
attributes.background: We believe that the government should be doing more to help the schools in the UK reduce their carbon footprint and be more eco -friendly. Most schools have plastic packaging,single use water bottles and waste a lot of paper.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the environmental impact of schools, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In any case, the UK Government is only responsible for schools in England, not the rest of the UK.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Create legal requirements for schools to reduce, reuse and recycle: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583980
